---
# https://albert-rapp.de/posts/13_quarto_blog_writing_guide/13_quarto_blog_writing_guide.html#listing-pages-including-rss-feeds
title: "Ajay's blog"
listing:
  contents: posts/**/*.qmd
  sort: "date desc"
  type: default
  categories: true
  sort-ui: [title, date]
  filter-ui: true
  fields: [date, title, reading-time, description, categories]
  feed: # Create RSS feed
    type: metadata
    language: en-us
  exclude:
    contents: posts/git-tips/**/*.qmd
  date-format: medium
page-layout: full
title-block-banner: false
---
